pullRequest.title: Log the peer leader replica info in onPartitionBecomeLeaderFromStandBy
pullRequest.bodyText: Warmup changes for the leader based replication project.  This change logs and prints all peer leader replica information (including the current node) when a node transitions from standby to leader.
